attributes.action: Government to reintroduce shielding for those who are high risk or vulnerable
attributes.additional_details: I want the government to do this because I myself, and many others working at the hospital are high risk and vulnerable and I believe we should not be at work during this time.
attributes.background: I want the government to reintroduce shielding for those who are high risk or vulnerable.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Extend shielding until further notice: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/331709

Reintroduce shielding with financial support: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552096
